fields.Name: Randuin's Omen
fields.Description: +400 Health +60 Armor -10% Damage taken from Critical Strikes UNIQUE Passive - Cold Steel: When hit by basic attacks, reduces the attacker's Attack Speed by 15%. UNIQUE Active: Slows the Movement Speed of nearby enemy units by 35% for 4 seconds (60 second cooldown). (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
